alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 03 at 3:55AM EST until March 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON EST TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR COASTAL MARTIN COUNTY... * AFFECTED AREA...Volusia, Lake, Orange, Seminole, Osceola, Okeechobee, Indian River, Saint Lucie, Martin, and Brevard Counties. * TIMING...Noon Friday through 7 PM * WINDS...South to Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 35 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 80s to lower 90s. * IMPACTS...Any new or existing fires will be capable of rapid spread.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur with dry vegetation, gusty winds and low humidity. Stay aware of later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
